.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Complete() cil managed
Public Sub Complete ()
public: virtual void Complete();

summary.span: 向 發出訊號，表示不應接受也不應產生任何其他訊息，也不應使用任何其他延後的訊息。

span.span: Signals to the that it should not accept nor produce any more messages nor consume any more postponed messages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 之後已經在資料流程區塊上呼叫，該區塊將會完成，且其工作會進入最終狀態它已經處理所有先前可用的資料。After has been called on a dataflow block, that block will complete, and its task will enter a final state after it has processed all previously available data. 將區塊等待完成發生，而是會起始要求但要等待完成發生，可能使用的工作。 will not block waiting for completion to occur, but rather will initiate the request; to wait for completion to occur, the task may be used.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Threading.Tasks.Task Completion { get; }
.property instance class System.Threading.Tasks.Task Completion
Public ReadOnly Property Completion As Task
public: property System::Threading::Tasks::Task ^ Completion { System::Threading::Tasks::Task ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得 ，其表示非同步作業和資料流程區塊的完成。

span.span: Gets a that represents the asynchronous operation and completion of the dataflow block.
The task.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 資料流程區塊會時視為完成它目前未處理的訊息，以及當它有保證，不會處理任何其他訊息。A dataflow block is considered completed when it is not currently processing a message and when it has guaranteed that it will not process any more messages. 傳回完成相關聯的區塊時，會轉換為已完成狀態。The returned will transition to a completed state when the associated block has completed. 會轉換到區塊完成其處理成功根據資料流程區塊時的狀態定義語意。It will transition to the state when the block completes its processing successfully according to the dataflow block’s defined semantics. 會轉換到狀態時即為資料流程區塊已完成處理提前因未處理的例外狀況，且會轉換到資料流程區塊完成狀態過早處理，因為收到取消要求。It will transition to the state when the dataflow block has completed processing prematurely due to an unhandled exception, and it will transition to the state when the dataflow block has completed processing prematurely due to receiving a cancellation request. 當工作在狀態，其`Exception`屬性會傳回包含造成失敗之區塊的一或多個例外狀況。If the task completes in the state, its `Exception` property will return an containing the one or more exceptions that caused the block to fail.
